=== Step 1: Register a gmail or other jabber protocol account ===

http://mail.google.com/mail/signup will give you a functional jabber account.

If you know Dutch there is also: http://jabberweb.be/register/

Most servers also allow creation of an account from within you jabber client.

=== Step 2: Enter your account information into gaim instant messenger ===

Google explains how to use your jabber account in gaim instant messenger:
http://www.google.com/support/talk/bin/answer.py?answer=24073

=== Step 3: Add the conference room to your jabber account in gaim instant messenger ===
* Start gaim and log on to your account.
* Go to Contacts -> Add chat.
* Enter your own information in the dialog: <nowiki>[[attachment:gaimconfig.png]]</nowiki>
